examples.text: Yutamayacağını bildiğin lokmayı neden yedin? Niye yaptın O.E?
examples.translation: Why did you knowingly bit off more than you could chew? Why did you do it [you] son of a bitch

examples.text: Zır deli hayatsız bir oe maalesef. Ciddiye almayın, engelleyip geçiniz.
examples.translation: She's a lifeless lunatic son of a bitch unfortunately. Do not take her seriously, just block and go on with your day.
If you ask him he would want sharia son of a bitch

examples.text: ders programını ayarlayankimse onjn ben amk 5 dersi 5 gune nasıl yaydins en oe
examples.translation: Whoever made the class schedule fuck you how did you manage to spread 5 classes over 5 days [you] son of a bitch
